meanings.definition: Covered in or consisting of scurf.
meanings.sent1: The old book had the scurfiest cover I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: After playing in the dusty attic, his hands were the scurfiest.
meanings.sent3: The scurfiest cat in the neighborhood always left a trail of fur behind.
meanings.sent4: Her scurfiest personality made it hard for others to get close to her.
meanings.sent5: The scurfiest blanket felt rough against my skin.

meanings.definition: Having a rough or scaly appearance.
meanings.sent1: The lizard's skin was the scurfiest of all the reptiles in the exhibit.
meanings.sent2: The scurfiest tree bark I've ever touched was in the forest behind our house.
meanings.sent3: Despite his scurfiest look, he was actually quite friendly.
meanings.sent4: The scurfiest terrain proved to be a challenge for the hikers.
meanings.sent5: The scurfiest rock on the beach was sharp to the touch.
